alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:57PM MDT until July 03 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FREMONT COUNTY... At 455 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were moving through the Wind River Basin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Sand Draw around 505 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Boysen State Park and Hidden Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Fremont County. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
